code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{API_BASE_URL}from'../config';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Register=_ref=>{let{onRegisterSuccess}=_ref;const[form,setForm]=useState({name:'',email:'',password:''});const[error,setError]=useState('');const handleChange=e=>setForm({...form,[e.target.name]:e.target.value});const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{await axios.post(`${API_BASE_URL}/api/auth/register`,form);if(onRegisterSuccess)onRegisterSuccess();}catch(err){var _err$response,_err$response$data;setError(((_err$response=err.response)===null||_err$response===void 0?void 0:(_err$response$data=_err$response.data)===null||_err$response$data===void 0?void 0:_err$response$data.message)||'Registration failed');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Register"}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"error",children:error}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{name:"name",placeholder:"Name",value:form.name,onChange:handleChange,required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{name:"email",type:"email",placeholder:"Email",value:form.email,onChange:handleChange,required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{name:"password",type:"password",placeholder:"Password",value:form.password,onChange:handleChange,required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Register"})]});};export default Register;
